sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./planning.css"; import pic1 from "../../../assests/pic1.png"; import pic2 from "../../../assests/pic2.png"; import pic3 from "../../../assests/pic3.png"; import pic4 from "../../../assests/pic4.png"; import pic5 from "../../../assests/pic5.png"; import pic6 from "../../../assests/pic6.png"; import pic7 from "../../../assests/pic7.png"; import pic8 from "../../../assests/pic8.png"; import pic9 from "../../../assests/pic9.png"; import pic10 from "../../../assests/pic10.png"; import pic11 from "../../../assests/pic11.png"; import pic12 from "../../../assests/pic12.png"; import pic13 from "../../../assests/pic13.png"; import pic14 from "../../../assests/pic14.png"; import pic15 from "../../../assests/pic15.png"; import pic16 from "../../../assests/pic16.png"; import pic17 from "../../../assests/pic17.png"; import pic18 from "../../../assests/pic18.png"; import pic19 from "../../../assests/pic19.png"; import pic20 from "../../../assests/pic20.png"; import ar1 from "../../../assests/ar1.png" import ar2 from "../../../assests/ar2.png" function Planning() { return ( <>
It’s worth planning for, every day. You’ve reached the right place Achieve your life’s most important goals confidently and feel proud.
Tax
Invest
Retire
Take the 1st step and book a 15 minutes free profile consultation with our expert counselors {/* */}
HOW WE FLY? Prompt Services. Quick decisions. GET ON BOARD
Valuable advice,tailored to you super affordable, simple and easy. Insure what matters.
Protect your life and wages so that no matter what happens, the people you love can keep moving forward. Invest when you’re ready.
Build on the security you’ve made for yourself. Dedicate part of each paycheck to big goals, such as retirement or college, in accounts that earn differently than regular savings. Retire on your terms.
You want to live well when you retire—and while you’re earning it. Save a little each month and increase it over time. Your workplace may offer a plan to help. What is Financial Planning? Financial Plan is a written document that clearly defines
The road-map or strategies to achieve your life’s important financial goals, reduces financial risk & money-related uncertainties of future needs and helps you maintain a good financial health. Financial Planning helps you take better control of your financial situation, enhance the quality of life and make you feel money confident. Financial Planning covers all aspect of Money Management
Retirement Planning What should be your retirement corpus to lead a happy retired life. Tax Planning Proper tax planning will help you save tax, leaving more money in your hand. Estate Planning It is a dynamic process that needs to be reviewed at regular intervals Wealth Planning Wealth planning is the art of structuring your wealth while building it {/*retirement planning*/}
Retirement planning
Plan for your future today Every retirement journey is unique.
Whatever your vision is for your retirement, you can make sure it's achievable by getting your finances right beforehand. Reaching your retirement goals Our experts know, achieving your dream retirement is no small feat. That’s why we’ll help you create a tailored retirement plan as part of your wider financial planning needs, so you can rest assured your future looks as you want it to. Your retirement income needs will depend on the type of life you want after you stop working. Whatever your aspirations, be it travelling or starting your own business, through retirement planning we’ll help you make the most of your pension and other investments so you can enjoy the retirement you deserve.
Our experts help you with retirement planning in a number of ways: Work out how much you’ll need for your ideal retirement. Help you maximise pension tax relief. Utilise savings and other investments to boost your retirement pot. Advise on pension consolidation so you know how much you have – and where you have it. Explain retirement income options – a pension isn’t your only option. We’ll show you why. Our retirement planning guide Learn more about our latest retirement planning guide here and prepare for the future you want today. {/*tax planning*/}
Tax planning
Everyone has their own financial goals and objectives; effective tax planning may allow you to reach them faster.
Paying unnecessary tax can make a big hole in any retirement or investment plan, but an independent financial adviser may be able to help reduce an individual’s or company’s tax liabilities, meaning you get to keep more of what you earn.
Tax planning is a complex area and is subject to change. Advice should always be tailored to your specific circumstances, and if you’re not sure where to start, an AFH independent financial adviser will be able to create a plan centred on your needs and objectives, so you can enjoy the most of your income. How can DC&CO help? Gill could make a pension contribution of £12,000 before 6 April 2020 from her savings to her group personal pension plan. How would this impact her position? The £12,000 net paid would attract tax relief at source of 20%, increasing the amount invested to £15,000. Gill's adjusted net income would reduce by £15,000, and would allow her to reclaim her full personal allowance, reducing her self-assessment balancing payment by £3,000. Gill would be able to reclaim a further £3,000 tax relief, as the payment to the pension would qualify for tax relief at her highest rate paid (40%), of which she only received 20% relief at source. Another way of looking at it would be that Gill would get a £15,000 investment in her pension for a net cost to her of £6,000. {/*Estate planning*/}
Estate Planning
Estate Planning is not only for the Rich and the Old. And it is not an exercise to be looked after post retirement.Estate Planning simply refers to passing down of your assets from one generation to another.Let’s dig in deeper….
Myths About Estate Planning
People are under a delusion when it comes to estate planning – that's what our experience reveals. Some either wait until retirement or some completely ignore. Before we get into the nitty gritties of estate planning, let's first look at a few common myths about estate planning….
What is Estate Planning
Estate planning in simple terms refers to the passing assets / investments down from one generation to another. You decide how much of your estate – be it property(s), car(s), personal accolades, financial investments, etc. – you want to pass on to whom and how, after your demise. It is a dynamic process that needs to be reviewed at regular intervals to absorb any changes that might happen in our life or in the laws of the country. Selecting the Right Estate Planner The role of an estate planner in estate planning An estate planner plays a very important role in estate planning. It doesn’t really matter how old your estate planner is, where his office is, the gender, his/her provenance; if he/she meets the desirable qualities. The qualities of an estate planner cannot be judged in a single meeting, but spread over several initial meetings. During these meetings, you ought to deeply engage with the estate planner, asking pertinent questions such as.
); } export default Planning;
